unnormalised: Okay, so return policies, right? Super important, especially online. Remember when I bought that saree online for Diwali? It was totally different from the picture! Thankfully, the site had a good return policy. My friend Priya had a similar issue with a pressure cooker she ordered - major bummer! Good return policies are like that extra spoon of biryani on your plate - always appreciated! Even local shops like Sharmaji's general store need clear policies, na? Otherwise, jhagda!
